About

Hieu is a lazy employee (at HUST) and a devoted dreamer. He used to be a prolific blogger (the-fools.net, gone long ago!), an eccentric street photographer (fridaycafe.com - personal portfolio, viahe.org - a community photography site, both of which are gone recently), and a reluctant translator. He likes playing and creating ... things :-)
